Module.Name: riris
Module.AfterInstallMessage: The project is installed. Go to directory cd ${libdir}${packagename} wget --continue https://github.com/intersystems-community/iris-driver-distribution/raw/main/DB-API/intersystems_irispython-3.2.0-py3-none-any.whl pip3 install intersystems_irispython-3.2.0-py3-none-any.whl run the programm ./riris -p SYS cls %Library.Utility Date 5
